EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Charlotte Farmer (1342623688.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Charlotte, Thank you so much. Jackie – nice to meet you via email. Please let me know if you would like to schedule a call to speak about our services. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: charlotte farmer [mailto:farmer.charlotte@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2012 12:48 AM To: Sara Conde; jdmc1959@aol.com Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Charlotte Farmer Sara-I am connecting you to Jackie. Enjoy! Kind Regards,CharlotteOn Mon, Jun 18, 2012 at 11:11 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hi Charlotte, My name is Sara Conde and I received your contact information from Steve Arhancet. From this point on I’ll be your main point of contact at MBO. Steve has brought me up to speed on your background but if you would like to set up a time to chat you may go here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVBLuEJkpf%2BRI7vhkCHUf7ivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. We also greatly appreciate the lead you may be sending our way per your message below. I look forward to workign with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVBLuEJkpf%2BRI7vhkCHUf7ivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVBLuEJkpf%2BRI7vhkCHUf7ivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. From: charlotte farmer [mailto:farmer.charlotte@gmail.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:farmer.charlotte@gmail.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVBLuEJkpf%2BRI7vhkCHUf7ivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Friday, June 15, 2012 1:21 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Charlotte Farmer Hi Steve! Great to hear from you. Thanks for following up with me.I am pointing a high potential individual your way. Kind regards,C
On Friday, June 15, 2012, Steve Arhancet wrote: Dear Charlotte, We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you. We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVBLuEJkpf%2BRI7vhkCHUf7ivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email. Regards, Steven___________________________________Steve ArhancetDirector, Consultant ServicesMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6011 <tel:%28703%29%20793-6011>f: 703.793.6081 <tel:703.793.6081>e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&javascript:_e(%7b%7d,%20>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVBLuEJkpf%2BRI7vhkCHUf7ivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>
